channel.title: CVE Feed for Capensis -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Capensis -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4564|2024-08-02T07:31:06.603Z -- capensis -- canopsis
item.description: This vulnerability could allow an attacker to store a malicious JavaScript payload in the broadcast message parameter within the admin panel.

item.title: CVE-2023-3196|2024-08-02T06:48:08.281Z -- capensis -- canopsis
item.description: This vulnerability could allow an attacker to store a malicious JavaScript payload in the login footer and login page description parameters within the administration panel.
